summary.para: Gets or sets a delegate used to create a for writing text to the response.
Write to directly to write binary data to the response.

remarks.para: The created by this delegate will encode text and write to the stream. Call this delegate to create a for writing text output to the response stream.
To implement a formatter that writes binary data to the response stream, do not use the delegate, and use instead.
